DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test the safety and effectiveness of a purified extract of CH-19 Sweet, containing capsinoids.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Chili Pepper Extract on Weight and Fat Loss and Metabolism Increase
DOC.criteria: Is overweight or obese but otherwise generally healthy who interested in losing weight BMI of 25 to 35 kg/m2 Waist/hip ratio of 0.9 or more for male and 0.85 for female. Type 1 or 2 diabetes mellitus cardiovascular disease (other than mild, controlled hypertension or dislidemia) On a weightloss program within six months
DOC.keyword: Resting metabolic rate and fat oxidation in men
